input_text:
Job Title: Licensed Real Estate Sales Listing Agent

Location: Philadelphia, PA

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Management, Sales

Description:
The #1 Real Estate Brokerage in Philadelphia, KW EMPOWER, is officially hiring both new and experienced real estate agents. Launched in January 2024 - KW Empower is redefining the agent experience through innovation, education and layers of support for all experience levels. We are a hands on real estate brokerage that believes in agent collaboration. We highly encourage all agents to come visit our office when you're available to experience our culture and training.

KW Empower's Productivity Coaching Program was just awarded the #1 Coaching Program in the region (KW Greater PA/NJ/DE) for success rate, development and consistent track record of helping new agents get into productivity. More information will be sent on that after your application is received.

Job Type Full-time

Benefits

Employee assistance programEmployee discountFlexible scheduleProfessional development assistance

Schedule

Choose your own hours

Question(s)

Interested in real estate school?Already licensed?

If so, start your application today.

Compensation

$59,000 +

Responsibilities

Convert pre-qualified leads that are passed on from sales agents to schedule listing appointments and grow the business Assist clients on closing days by being present during their final step of the home-buying process when neededCall clients weekly to provide feedback on their property listing to keep them engaged and improve customer service ratingsProspecting and conducting lead generation activities to create new businessHandle all aspects of MLS and marketing listings, such as completing listing paperwork, posting to MLS and social media, and implementing a marketing plan to ensure quick sales

Qualifications

1+ year of prior experience in the real estate industry Ability to work on your own and motivate yourselfTeam player who believes their success is the teamâ€™s successShows in-depth knowledge of real estate industry and can accurately conduct market research Ability to use or quickly learn Real Estate specific CRM and marketing/lead technologiesBe a licensed real estate agent.Be ready to dive into an extensive training program that is designed for success.Be ready to work in an exciting and energetic atmosphere!

About Company

KW Empower is a leading force in the Center City Philadelphia and Suburban markets. The core values within our firm are family first and education second. We are here to help develop your skill set so you can grow on to grow your career.

1

Experience Level (if available): Entry level
